title: 1999/200/EC: Commission Decision of 26 February 1999 concerning the intention of the Hellenic Republic to apply a reduced rate of VAT to supplies of natural gas and electricity in accordance with Article 12(3)(b) of Council Directive 77/388/EEC (notified under document number C(1999) 477) (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 February 1999 concerning the intention of the Hellenic Republic to apply a reduced rate of VAT to supplies of natural gas and electricity in accordance with Article 12(3)(b) of Council Directive 77/388/EEC (notified under document number C(1999) 477) (Only the Greek text is authentic) (1999/200/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The measure described by the Hellenic Republic in its letter of 30 November 1998 under which a reduced rate of VAT would be applied to supplies of natural gas and electricity irrespective of the manner in which they are produced or supplied (whether supplied domestically, or acquired elsewhere in the Community, or imported) does not carry any risk of distortion of competition.
The Hellenic Republic may accordingly apply the measure from 1 January 1999 onward.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 1999.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
